performance_metrics.name: Code Generation Throughput (Lines of Code/Second)
performance_metrics.description: Measures the rate at which the system generates code. Higher values indicate greater efficiency. This metric is heavily influenced by code complexity and target platform.

performance_metrics.name: Code Generation Accuracy (Percentage)
performance_metrics.description: The percentage of generated code that meets predefined specifications and passes validation tests. Crucial for minimizing debugging and rework costs.

performance_metrics.name: Code Coverage (Percentage)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of the intended functionality or specified requirements covered by the generated code. Used to assess the completeness of the code generation process.

performance_metrics.name: Platform Specificity Performance (Response Time)
performance_metrics.description: The time taken for the generated code to execute on the target platform. This varies greatly based on the target architecture and complexity.  Measured under peak load conditions.

performance_metrics.name: Resource Utilization (CPU%, Memory%)
performance_metrics.description: Measures the system’s impact on hardware resources.  Important for scaling and integration with existing infrastructure.

implementation_requirements.name: Input Specification Format
implementation_requirements.specification: Structured Data (JSON, YAML), Formal Specification Language (e.g., Alloy, SpOck)
implementation_requirements.description: Code generation systems require a precise and unambiguous representation of the desired code. Formal specification languages offer superior accuracy and verification capabilities.

implementation_requirements.name: Target Platform Support
implementation_requirements.specification: Java (JDK 17+), C++, Python (3.9+), JavaScript (ES6+), Embedded Systems (RTOS support)
implementation_requirements.description: The system must support the target programming languages and platforms.  Consider future-proofing by supporting widely adopted standards.

implementation_requirements.name: Code Generation Template Library
implementation_requirements.description: A library of pre-built code templates for common use cases. Template maintenance and updates are crucial for long-term usability and adaptability.

implementation_requirements.name: Version Control Integration
implementation_requirements.description: Seamless integration with version control systems for code tracking, collaboration, and rollback capabilities.

implementation_requirements.name: Automated Testing Framework Integration
implementation_requirements.description: Integration with automated testing frameworks to validate generated code and ensure its correctness.

implementation_requirements.name: Configuration Management
implementation_requirements.description: Supports automated configuration and deployment of code generation infrastructure.

operational_considerations: Template Maintenance & Updates - Dedicated team or process.
Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) - Automated code generation and deployment pipeline.
Human-in-the-Loop Validation - Especially for critical applications – involves human review of generated code.
Scalability - System architecture should support increasing code generation demands.
Security - Implement robust security measures to protect against vulnerabilities in generated code.
Monitoring & Logging - Comprehensive monitoring of system performance and error logs.
Training - Proper training for operators and developers on system usage and best practices.

input.system_message: You are an AI assistant specialized in industrial engineering and specifications. For the given topic, provide a comprehensive overview of industrial/commercial specifications including performance metrics and implementation requirements. Be precise with numerical values and include ranges where appropriate. Focus on practical technical details that would be relevant to professionals in the field.
input.user_message:
Create detailed industrial specifications for: Code Generation

Format your response as a JSON object with these categories:
1. performance_metrics: An array of metrics with names, values/ranges, and descriptions
2. implementation_requirements: An array of requirements with names, specifications, and descriptions
3. industry_standards: An array of relevant standards and certifications
4. key_suppliers: An array of major equipment/technology suppliers for this industry
5. operational_considerations: An array of important operational factors

Please provide realistic values for industrial/commercial scale implementations.

Return ONLY valid JSON without any additional text, explanation, or code block formatting.
